Class Monster

java.lang.Object
Monsters.Monster
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hydra, MechaBeast, Minotaur
public abstract sealed class Monster extends Object permits Hydra, Minotaur, MechaBeast
File: Monster.java Name: Luka Nikabadze Course: IST 242, Section 001: Inter OO App Dev Assignment: Solo Lab 2 Description: Abstract sealed parent class that represents a Monster. This class demonstrates abstraction and supports polymorphism through the specialPowers() method which is implemented in child classes.

  • Method Details

    • specialPowers

      public abstract void specialPowers()
      Prints the monster's special power. Child classes implement this method (polymorphism).
